data: Of course, I know not how it may be with you; but with me the mail brings daily a multitude of communications that I have not sought, and do not want; nor do I refer to bills alone; and so, when there came one day a printed card saying:
How Doth the Simple Spelling Bee
browsing: humour|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: humour|category: novels|category: american literature
